tips.title: ${GUIDEDS_COUNT} Free Meditations
tips.text:
Every day more than ${TEACHERS_COUNT} of the world’s best meditation teachers upload new guided meditations, music tracks, talks  and podcasts.

Experiment with different approaches to find a teacher and style that suits you.
tips.offline_text:
Discover thousands of free guided meditations, music, talks and podcasts from over a thousand meditation teachers.

Experiment with different approaches to find a teacher and style that suits you.

tips.title: ${GROUPS_COUNT} Discussion Groups
tips.text: Discover over ${GROUPS_COUNT} discussion groups and local meet-ups ranging from humour and compassion to spirituality and mindfulness. There’s even a wonderful Rumi poetry group!
tips.offline_text: Discover thousands of groups and local meet-ups ranging from humour and compassion to spirituality and mindfulness. There’s even a wonderful Rumi poetry group!

tips.title: Profile + Privacy
tips.text:
Track your progress, earn milestones, and send messages of support to friends.

To configure your Privacy Settings click the icon top right.

tips.title: The Timer
tips.text:
Hundreds of features for a deeply personal meditation experience.

Create your own presets, configure interval bells, and choose different ambient sounds. Then just sit back, relax, and meditate!
